event.descr:
The Apache HTTP daemon reports that a specified DocumentRoot does not exist.
DocumentRoot: %parm[documentRoot]%
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%

The Apache HTTP daemon at %interface% generated a Syslog Message.
Node ID: %nodeid%
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%
event.logmsg:
An unknown Apache HTTPD syslog message has been received

Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
